t: Amazon Just Launched Two Furniture Brands — And You Can Get Them Shipped Using Prime
s: November 7, 2017 - Each of the brands has a distinct identity, but both offer furniture staples to furnish an entire home, from sofas and love seats to wall decor. Bonus: You can get free shipping on both collections with an Amazon Prime account. We doubt two-day shipping will be easy to come by, but long gone are the days of waiting weeks to get a new sofa. Who knows how far they're going to take this Amazon Key concept ...
